title: what would ricky ricardo use?
content:
i am about to make a neon sign for a neighborhood salsa cafe. they want something sort of thirties/forties outline style that, when read, makes you want to jump in a conga line with delores del rio. i know nothing about typestyles at all other than the standard ones. any ideas/suggestions?

 [‹ Modern serif typeface for a law firm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203259/http:/typophile.com/node/40792 "Go to previous forum topic") [Blackletter to match Fell types ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203259/http:/typophile.com/node/40725 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tarnashun

comments.content:
House Industries has some options -

Latino: [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=142&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203259/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=142&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=142&subpage=viewfonts")

Las Vegas: [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=27&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203259/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=27&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=27&subpage=viewfonts")

House-a-rama: [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=7&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203259/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=7&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=7&subpage=viewfonts")

Shag: [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=22&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203259/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=22&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=22&subpage=viewfonts")

i thank you both for your suggestions. i really liked castaway pattyfab. but i found ’poster paint’ and i think that is what will be used. if it all goes through, i will post what the sign looks like.
